name: Rapsodie Rap Label Manager
description:
Start your adventure in the rap industry

Become and manage your own rap label with RAPSODIE.

Sign your favorite artists, discover the talents of tomorrow, and challenge other players in quick confrontations.

No need to be a rap expert, let the game guide you!

RECRUIT, MANAGE, TRIUMPH

- Recruitment: Recruit from over 4,000 rappers, from legends (Kaaris, Lorenzo, Koba LaD) to young prodigies (Kerchak, Mademoiselle Lou, Yame)
- Artist Development: Improve your artists' skills by participating in Focuses.
- Daily Revenue: Benefit from your artists' real performances to generate revenue each day.
- Quick Confrontations: Challenge other labels in fast and strategic 1v1 matches.
- Reality-Based: The referenced artists are real and their performances depend on current trends.
- Develop your manager reputation: Earn titles as your career evolves based on your strategic approach, personality, and recruitment decisions to attract young talent.

DYNAMIC AND STRATEGIC 1v1 DUELS

Confrontation mode inspired by card games: Face your opponents in quick and strategic duels. Each game lasts about 3 minutes. Be demanding, fast, and clever.

Varied and captivating matches: Each confrontation is unique, requiring a creative approach and problem-solving ability.

CONNECT WITH THE COMMUNITY

- Join an active community of music enthusiasts.
- Challenge your friends and rivals in exciting duels.

CONSTANT RENEWED CONTENT

- New artists, missions, and challenges added constantly.
- Special events and regular updates to enrich the gaming experience.
